original_text: So I put some men behind the lowest part of the wall where there were holes. Each of the families had guards with swords, spears, bows and arrows.
korean_text: 내가 성벽 뒤의 낮고 넓은 곳에 백성이 그들의 종족을 따라 칼과 창과 활을 가지고 서 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: So I put some men behind the lowest part of the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 성벽의 가장 낮은 부분 뒤에一些人을 배치했습니다

sentences.original_text: Each of the families had guards
with swords, spears, bows and arrows
